title: Intermittent failure to write incoming mail to mailbox
content:
Ever since updating Thunderbird to 102.10.0 there have been intermittent problems when downloading POP3 message to my Inbox. Sometimes it works OK. Other times I get error messages to the effect that Thunderbird can not write to the mailbox and to check for file space and/or access permissions. Permissions are OK and there is LOTS of free file space!

Problem is that messages are being marked as read on the server and so not downloaded next time I "get new messages", but of course they've not been written to the Inbox, so messages are being 'lost' at random :-(
creator: cjlosment

title: La mail non allega i file nell'inoltro e compaiono caratteri strani
content: Buongiorno come già segnalato non so perchè la posta non mi funziona più correttamente Se faccio un inoltro di una mail con allegati in alcuni casi me li tiene in altri no e non dipende dal peso degli allegati nè dal numero. In alcuni casi poi, sempre facendo l'inoltro, la mail mi parte con caratteri strani sugli accenti La versione che ho è 102.10.0 (32 bit) Ho avviato in modalità provvisoria ma nulla, il problema c'è sempre Qualcuno può aiutarmi? Grazie SV
creator: viscardi.saba

title: Problema nella stampa
content: Se tento di stampare un allegato aprendolo dalla mail non me lo fa stampare e mi dice memoria esaurita
creator: viscardi.saba

title: Removing My Email Address from the Mozilla Thunderbird Server
content:
Hi Everyone,

I would be really grateful for some help please. I have been plagued by Brazilian Hackers trying to get into my email/Microsoft account for just over a year now (see example screen shot 1 below) and as a result I have always set-up long/complex passwords with 2 factor authentication. The Hackers have been sending emails to me in Portuguese (which is some comfort as they might not know I am English living in the UK). Unfortunately, I think they may have got very limited access to my Mozilla Thunderbird email account because, when I opened an email back in March 2023 from one of my usual contacts I saw lines of code (with a reference to Brazil) in the drop down menu which you would normally click on if you wanted to see full details/logos from the sender.

Needless to say, I panicked and deleted/uninstalled the Mozilla Thunderbird/Email account from my computer without first removing my email address from the Mozilla Thunderbird Server. I am very concerned that my emails will continue to be forwarded to my Mozilla Email Account on the server (which I now have no control over) and I am not sure if the Hackers have taken over the account. See Screen shot 2 below which shows some illegal syncing activity. My question is, how can I arrange for my email account to be deleted from the Mozilla Thunderbird Server. Thank you. David Matthews
creator: user103523030879332520688538749334438210706

title: Delete email account within Thunderbird
content: Hello. I have four email accounts linked to my Thunderbird but wish to delete one of them. What settings do I go to to do this please. Thanks. Neil

title: Unable to login in Thunderbird with my Google account
content:
When I try to login with my google account I am prompted with a window that says that my browser version is old and no longer supported.

After searching for similar problems I found out I forgot to enable IMAP from my Google account.

I did that and also deleted Thunderbird and all of its files and made a fresh install.

Nothing works, could anyone help me?

Extra info: The screenshot is attached. I am using the default settings for Google, which include OAUTH2.
creator: reyesguerreros12

title: Xfinity Email
content:
I could not send emails the last few days. I changed all of the smtp settings. No luck.

"The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.comcast.net failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again"

Then My wife told me she received an email from them a few days ago about 3rd party email apps. I never received this for the main Xfinity account. Go figure.

https://www.xfinity.com/support/articles/tls?rid=39735028975&mid=20230417_Adhoc_TRN_TLSSunsetEm4

title: Global undo threading needed to comply with ADA
content: How do we get a message to Thunderbird? Thunderbird made threading the default and one must unthread IN EVERY FOLDER individually. This is an extra complication that does not comply with ADA WCAG. Give us global unthread or maybe we need to consult an ADA attorney. Mozilla has been putting Accessibility barriers up for 5 years in both Firefox and Thunderbird when all of the add-ons became I'm fed up with the crap you put us through. Get your accessibility features back.

title: accessing storage Folders
content: For many Years I have been using T'Bird and have a substantial Collection of saved Storage Folders. Recently, I have found that for some Sub-Folders in one specific Group, I cannot access those some Folders. When I try to do so, all I see is Windows "Egg-Timer" continuing to display; but the Contents of the Folder never appears. These Folders are 6 Levels down from the basic Storage Folder. In some Cases I have moved a Folder up a Level and can then access it; but in other Cases, I cannot move the Folder. I have recently set up a new Computer with WIN11.

title: Mozbackup didn't backup local folders
content:
Hi

I have been using Thunderbird for years and I have recently upgraded my computer and migrated from Windows 7 to Windows 10. I run Mozbackup regularly after a previous experience taught me to backup via that system. However, mozbackup did not restore my local folders. The inbox was fine but that was it - no contacts or history etc etc. I used the non local IMAP email protocol to ensure I could reload in case of a crash. Neither appears to have worked as intended. Can you please advise how I can get my data back? I have contacted my ISP who were of no assistance.

Regards

Chris
creator: aussiechris

title: Thunderbird move from Windows 10 to Windows 11 fails with "Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible"
content:
Hello,

Have tried repeatedly moving Thunderbird 102.10.0 from Win10 to Win11 using various means (USB drive, OneDrive, map local network drive, etc). No use. The instructions cannot be simpler, yet the result is the same every time. "Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible"

I don't know what else to try. My source %AppData%\Roaming\Thunderbird directory is abt. 11GB in size. Have been using it for 11y and would hate to lose all of my old email.

Any advice is greatly appreciated. Thank you so much in advance. Vlad
creator: vladd2

title: On startup Thunderbird opens wrong content in last opened tab
content: I have 9 email accounts configured in Thunderbird (TB). I typically have a half a dozen tabs open at a time in TB, generally the same half a dozen. For at least a year now when I re-open TB the same number of tabs open, with the last-selected tab selected. So far all is well, except that the selected tab switches from the email account that it was open in against when I shut down TB to the first account in the Folders pane. I then have to switch it back to the correct account every time. It's gotten annoying enough that I've now joined this Support site so I can ask how to fix this. I tried the "open the profiles folder, quit TB, delete the session.json file and re-open TB" dance, but all that did was cause it to forget all of the previously opened tabs. I re-opened them in the desired order, selected the 4th one at random, then quit TB. When I re-started it, the 4th tab was selected, but the content was the first account in the list instead of the one it should have been. For reference purposes, all the other tabs still have the appropriate accounts open in them. I have the same version of Thunderbird installed on 2 different Windows 10 computers, and both of them are manifesting this behavior. I'm currently running TB 102.10.0 (32-bit). Please advise as to how I can fix this. If there is any other information that I can gather that will assist you with resolving this issue please let me know. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
creator: salindley0
